participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and introspective, with a love for art and a unique sense of humor.
participant_1.background: I am not sure what my ethnicity is, but I do know that I love jello. I have two roommates. My nickname is bubblegum. I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob. I make pottery.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Warm and nurturing, passionate about cooking and enjoys a good mystery.
participant_2.background: I love cooking, and Thai food is my favorite to cook. I recently broke up with my girlfriend. I read many mysteries last year to help me relax after a long day of teaching kindergarten. I am close to my family as we have always been there for each other. I prefer to live alone, enjoying the freedom to watch my foreign films without interruption.

content.text: Doing well, thanks! Just finished teaching kindergarten and now I'm relaxing with a mystery novel.
Oh, that's nice! What's your favorite mystery novel you've read recently?
I really enjoyed "The Girl on the Train" by Paula Hawkins. It was so suspenseful and kept me guessing until the very end!
I've heard good things about that book! I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's really good. What do you like to do for fun?
I love to cook, and my favorite food to cook is Thai food. I also like to make pottery.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to make pottery.
It's not too hard to learn! There are a lot of great tutorials online.
Maybe I'll check that out sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I'm not really sure. I was adopted, so I don't know much about my biological parents.
Oh, that's interesting. Well, I'm glad you found a good home.
Me too! I love my family.
